name: Brahim BIDI
aboutMe:
I'm Ibrahim Bidi, the programming world is my specialty, everything related to JavaScript you will find me there, in the Frontend, Backend, on mobile and desktop, in robotics and blockchain, JavaScript has become everywhere.
I bet on javascript 22 years ago, it was on Earthüåç and now it's in spaceüöÄ

items.name: Web page
experience: Collaborated with front-end and back-end engineers, and designers to develop project experience
Expertise in developing accessible web designs for government organizations, adhering to WCAG 2.0 Level A standards set by the National Communications Commission
Proficient in SEO (Search Engine Optimization) and Google keyword research
Extensive experience in web development using modern frameworks like React.js and Vue.js
Skilled in designing responsive web pages using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
Led a team of designers/interns in website development and provided mentorship
Experience in deploying web applications using modern deployment tools and platforms
Proficient in using Business Intelligence (BI) tools for interface design, such as Power BI, Tableau, and Looker

items.name: Devs
experience: Designed UI/UX system interfaces using industry-standard tools like Figma and Sketch
Created marketing campaign materials and designed field cloths for exhibitions
Experience in designing product cases and packaging
Developed corporate identity systems and product logos
Designed visual icon sets for various applications
Planned and designed product catalog layouts
Created master templates for enterprise presentations

items.name: Blockchain
experience: Developed decentralized applications (DApps) using Ethereum blockchain and Solidity smart contracts
Implemented blockchain-based authentication and data security mechanisms
Experience in creating and deploying ERC-20 tokens and conducting token sales
Worked with blockchain development frameworks like Truffle and Embark
Utilized web3.js library for interacting with blockchain networks
Integrated blockchain solutions with existing web applications

items.name: Robotics
experience: Developed robotics applications using JavaScript and robotics frameworks like ROS (Robot Operating System)
Programmed robotic systems for autonomous navigation and manipulation tasks
Experience in developing computer vision algorithms for object detection and recognition
Utilized machine learning techniques for robotic perception and decision-making
Integrated robots with web interfaces for remote control and monitoring
Developed motion planning algorithms for robots using JavaScript libraries like Open Motion Planning Library (OMPL)

items.name: Artificial Intelligence
experience: Developed machine learning models using JavaScript libraries like TensorFlow.js and Keras.js
Implemented natural language processing (NLP) algorithms for text analysis and sentiment analysis
Experience in building recommendation systems and collaborative filtering algorithms
Utilized deep learning techniques for computer vision tasks such as image classification and object detection
Developed chatbots and virtual assistants using conversational AI frameworks like Dialogflow
Applied reinforcement learning algorithms for decision-making in AI systems
Worked with Node.js and Express.js to build AI-powered web applications
